Package ca.gc.cra.radar.api

package ca.gc.cra.radar.api
Command-line entry points for RADAR capture, live, assemble, and poster workflows.

Parses key=value arguments into strongly typed configuration records, applies validation (including BPF gating and safe defaults), and delegates to application pipelines.

CLI classes also encode structured exit codes and logging categories so operators can distinguish configuration, IO, and processing faults quickly.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools
    Auxiliary CLI tooling for RADAR operators (e.g., segment introspection utilities).
  • Class
    Description
    AssembleCli
    Entry point for running the assemble pipeline over captured segments.
    CaptureCli
    Entry point for packet capture using the RADAR port-based pipeline.
    CliArgsParser
    Utility for turning key=value CLI arguments into a lookup map.
    CliInput
    Parsed representation of CLI arguments split into flags and key/value pairs.
    CliPrinter
    Minimal console output helper for CLI usage text.
    ExitCode
    Standard exit codes for RADAR command-line entry points.
    LiveCli
    Launches the live RADAR capture pipeline from CLI key-value arguments.
    Main
    RADAR CLI dispatcher that routes to subcommands.
    PosterCli
    Entry point for rendering reconstructed protocol traffic into poster outputs.
